@srikk1786: Not released yet. You can guess why.

The best thing about this upload is the video quality: at many times when watching this, it seemed three dimensional. I don't recall ever seeing that before. It must have to do with the contrast between Jeff Bridges' body in the foreground and the beautiful azure sea in the background. I can't believe the encoding got 7 negative votes.

As for the movie itself, it's Out of the Past (1947) fused with Miami Vice. It would have been a totally unnecessary remake if it wasn't for the beautiful photography.
